<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script populates value of Heading text with title for Mobile Banner content type in Paris upgrade.</description>
        <name>Populate Heading text for Mobile banner</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function populateHeadingText() {
    var contentGr = new GlideRecord('sn_cd_content_mobile');
    contentGr.addQuery('content_type', 'ff192345b7633300264c2575de11a9b3');
    contentGr.addNullQuery('header_text');
    contentGr.query();
    while (contentGr.next()) {
        contentGr.setValue('header_text', contentGr.getValue('title'));
        contentGr.update();
    }
}
populateHeadingText();]]></script>
